name: Platforms
description:
Platforms is a platforming game with numerous features and levels and is inspired by retro platforming games.

Platforms is currently in early access.

Features include:

  • Numerous levels to play
  • Early version of the level editor
  • Level menu which allows replaying previously completed levels
  • Ability to customize your player character with coins earned from completing levels
  • Save/load easily with quick save and quick load

Planned features:

  • Steam workshop for custom-made levels.
  • New enemy types
  • Larger levels
  • More settings
